text_blocks.intro:
I am a curious and skilled data scientist, teacher, and clinical data manager who has a proven track record to drive business solutions improving patient care and outcomes. 
My expertise in data analysis together with my strong background in health care management, teaching, and mentoring makes my profile very unique. I am eager to bring my skillset to a dynamic and forward-thinking organization, where I can continue to challenge myself and make a meaningful impact.
text_blocks.industy_experience_aside: I have worked as a genomics data scientist mainly as client facing data scientist, conducting analysis and presenting results data and to clients wordwide. I am knowledgeable of rules and regulations undrelying products validation and compliance.
text_blocks.teaching_experience_aside: I am passionate about knowledge transfer. I beleive that complex concepts can be taughed to diverse audience using a mix of innovative teaching methods and a positive attitude. I have hundreds of anonymous participants feedbacks from all courses participants attesting high teaching qualifications.

entries.title: PhD. Data science, Bioinformatics

entries.title: Senior Data Scientist - Product Validation and Compliance
bullets: Planification, execution, risk based monitoring and reporting of clinical performance studies with emphasis on the data management aspect
Application of "Good Clinical Practices" (GCP certified) to all aspects of a clinical performance study
Gained knowlege in "Guidelines Data protection Regulations" (GDPR), ISO-20916 and IVDR
Elaboration of the "state of the art" of a device using systematic research defining key perfomance metrics

entries.title: Senior Clinical Data Manager
bullets: BI systems, LLM tuning /inference, Data Management, clinical data extraction, grant proposals
Centralisation of *omics data
Leading the Data Quality project

entries.title: Data Scientist
